import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {MatSnackBar} from '@angular/material/snack-bar'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', }) export class AppSideLoginComponent { usrNm: any; pwd: any; constructor(private _snackBar: MatSnackBar) {} gotoVdPg(){ console.log(this.usrNm); console.log(this.pwd); if(this.usrNm === undefined || this.usrNm === ''){ this._snackBar.open("Please enter a valid username", "Close"); } } }
Username Password
